qas.question: What test is required to enter aruba?
From what age do travelers need to show a negative test when entering aruba?

paragraphs.context: All travelers over the age of 12 must present a negative COVID-19 test result when entering Aruba. The test can be either an antigen or a PCR test and must have been carried out no more than 24 hours before departure. A health screening and temperature check will be carried out on arrival.
